result.execSummary:
The defendant Timothy A Stevenson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Timothy A Stevenson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Timothy A Stevenson was found guilty of Felon Possess Firearm, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.descr: House of Correction - Imposed and Stayed

supervisions.notes: Defendant advised since convicted of a felony, he is not allowed to possess any firearms.

miscConds.notes: Maintain absolute sobriety with random urine screens. Defendant to undergo anger management courses.

timeConds.notes: Huber for work and treatrment (Court leaves electronic monitoring up to Sheriff's Dept.) Defendant report date is 12/05/2014 before 12 p.m.

charges.descr: Endangering Safety by Use of Dangerous Weapon (Under the Influence of Intoxicant)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy A Stevenson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court with attorney Christopher S. Carson.  Nicole J. Sheldon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Presentence report reviewed.  Statements made as to sentencing.  
AS TO COUNT 1: Court ordered the defendant to serve 6 months in the HOC with credit for 5 days time served and huber for work and treatment. 
The Court STAYED this sentence and placed the defendant on probation for a period of 2 YEARS with the following conditions:  
Defendant to serve 30 DAYS in the House of Correction with huber for work and treatment (court leaves electronic monitoring up to the Sheriff's Department);  Defendant has a report date of 12.5.14 before 12pm. 
*Maintain absolute sobriety with random urine screens.  Defendant to undergo anger management counseling.
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs over the duration of probation or a civil judgment is ordered.
No possession of firearms.
Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and surcharges over the duration of probation or, if not paid, a civil judgment is ordered.
Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court with attorney Christopher S. Carson.  Denis Stingl for Randy Sitzberger  appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 

AS TO COUNT ONE: 

 Defendant waived rights and pled guilty.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.

ON MOTION OF THE STATE, COURT ORDERED COUNTS TWO AND THREE:  DISMISSED. Court ordered a PSI with sentencing recommendation to be done. 
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for 12-02-2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court with attorney Christopher S. Carson.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge John Siefert, Branch 47. Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 22, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court with attorney Christopher S. Carson.  William Levins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Deputy Court Clerk:  ss

Case heard as to status of counsel.  Case is to be calendared in Prelim Court for prelim hearing.  Hearing scheduled for 09-11-2014 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered case adjourned for status ON COUNSEL  conference in Branch 47. lr  Status conference scheduled for 08-28-2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court.  William Levins appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court found defendant NOT  indigent.

Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court.  William Levins for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant appears without counsel.   
As of August 3, 2014 due to judicial rotation this case will be reassigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Siefert, Branch 47.   Court suspends the proceedings and orders the case adjourned for CAUSE for an Indigency Hearing.  Same Bail.  
  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 11, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation and requests additional time to retain counsel.  Court orders case adjourned for CAUSE for preliminary hearing in branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 25, 2014 at 08:30 am.
The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Timothy A Stevenson in court with attorney Melissa J. Fitzsimmons.  Dennis P. Murphy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Watts, Branch 15.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 16, 2014 at 08:30 am.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 7/8/14 @ 1:30pm
